scripts.clean: rm -fr build && rm -f plugin/dist/*.tgz && rm -fr node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.build: tsc && cp plugin/src/plugin-package.json build/package.json && tsc -d plugin/src/index.ts --declarationDir build --target ES2015 --module commonjs
scripts.package: npm run build && mkdirp plugin/dist && tar -czf plugin/dist/nativescript-http2.tgz build
scripts.pre-start: npm run clean && npm run package && cd demo && rm -fr node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.start-android: npm run pre-start && cd demo && ns run android --device large
scripts.start-ios: npm run pre-start && cd demo && ns run ios --device large
scripts.ci-android: npm run pre-start && cd demo; ls -l; cat webpack.config.js; ns build android
scripts.ci-ios: npm run pre-start && cd demo; ls -l; cat webpack.config.js; ns build ios
scripts.node-test: npm run start-test-server && npm run run-test-client
